thread.section_title: WowVendor.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WowVendor.com | wowvendor.com | 4 of 14
thread.title: William Flescher

author: William Flescher
title: William Flescher
text: Purchased a full clear of an Instance and was scheduled within minutes. Quick, fast, with clear instructions on mechanics and the Boss fights. I would definitely recommend. A bit pricier than comparable services but well worth the extra cash for ease of transaction and experience. The group even gave me pointers on my Spec and gear, which was nice and completely not expected nor necessary.
